item.title: Safari Firefox Theme
item.description: Firefox WhiteSur theme A MacOS & Windows Firefox theme to look more like Big Sur Safari. (For Firefox 70+) Description Aim is to make Firefox look more like MacOS Big Sur Safari. This is a CSS theme adapted to work on MacOS from the Linux GTK theme. Based on https://github.com/vinceliuice/WhiteSur-gtk-theme/tree/master/src/other/firefox (This is a quick modification, and is not written from scratch.) Installation (MacOS) Download the latest release, or clone the repo above.
